jobInfo.postDescription:
(此岗位为wifi驱动开发，测试勿扰，要求必需具备wifi经验和嵌入式软件经验，编程经验C/C++为必须项）

Job Overview:
The candidate works on design and implementation of QCOM WiFi platform and networking applications for IoT. Deliver high-quality and time-to-market features without any delay. Response/resolve quickly on customer issues. Work closely with other teams like Hardware, System and Test teams to drive feature delivery and resolve issues.

Minimum Qualifications:
-  1+ years’ experience on WiFi stack.
-  1+ years’ experience on Embedded C/C++ programming.
-  Excellent verbal and written English communication skills.
-  Strong independent problem-solving skills with proactive working attitude.

Preferred Qualification:
- Experience in WLAN SoC platform development.
- Experience in IoT application, multimedia
- Experience in networking application development.
- Good team work.

工作概述:
负责QCOM WiFi平台及物联网网络应用的设计与实现。没有任何延迟地交付高质量和及时上市的特性。快速响应/解决客户问题。与其他团队紧密合作，如硬件，系统和测试团队，推动功能交付和解决问题。
基本要求：
1年以上WiFi栈工作经验
1年以上嵌入式C/ c++编程经验
优秀的英语口头和书面沟通能力。
较强的独立解决问题的能力和积极主动的工作态度。
首选要求：
具有WLAN SoC平台开发经验。
有物联网应用、多媒体经验
有网络应用开发经验。
良好的团队合作精神。
jobInfo.address: 上海浦东新区高通企业管理(上海)有限公司7层

brandComInfo.introduce: Who is Qualcomm, and what do we do? We are engineers, scientists and business strategists. We are from many different countries and speak many different languages. We come from diverse cultures and have unique perspectives. Together, we focus on a single goal—we invent breakthrough technologies that transform how the world connects, computes, and communicates.
